title: Berkshire Hathaway Inc.
description: Berkshire Hathaway Inc. is an American multinational conglomerate holding company headquartered in Omaha, Nebraska, United States.

title: Blackrock Inc.
description: BlackRock, Inc. is an American multinational investment management corporation based in New York City.

title: Citadel Advisors LLC
description: Citadel LLC is an American multinational hedge fund and financial services company. Founded in 1990 by Ken Griffin, it has more than $62 billion in assets under management as of December 2022.
